Title: Relates to requiring standardized training curriculum for persons employed or volunteering at a mental health care provider certified or operated by the office for people with developmental disabilities
Summary: Requires standardized training curriculum for persons employed or volunteering at a mental health care provider facility certified or operated by the office for people with developmental disabilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.23, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to standardized training curriculum requirements
